.bowerrc
Gruntfile.js

npm init
bower init
create directory struture

npm install --save-dev grunt grunt-wiredep load-grunt-tasks grunt-contrib-watch grunt-contrib-jshint jshint
npm install --save express body-parser chance moment json-server

sudo npm install -g json-server
npm install -g browserify
sudo npm install -g grunt-cli

npm install -g nodemon

nodemon index.js
grunt changes

bower install --save angular bootstrap jquery moment chance

npm install chokidar --save
npm install --save fs-extra

npm install --save shelljs

git init
  git add .
  git commit -m "Demo"
  git push heroku master
  heroku open

  heroku ps:restart

  http://169.14.55.16:8080/bigs/
